biography: PJ Harvey (born Polly Jean Harvey on 9 October 1969) is an English singer, songwriter and musician. Outside her better-known music career, Harvey is also an occasional artist and actress. In 1998, she appeared in Hal Hartley's film "The Book of Life" as Magdalena and had a cameo role as a Playboy Bunny in "A Bunny Girl's Tale," a short film directed by Sarah Miles. Harvey also collaborated with Miles on another film, "Amaeru Fallout 1972."
name: PJ Harvey
